mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Curriculum (curriculumCate_no, workType, curriName, periodFr, periodTo, startDay, time, num, money, support, inquiry, state, package_no) VALUES( (SELECT curriculumCate_no FROM CurriculumCate WHERE curriculumCate_no = #{curriculumCate_no}), #{workType}, #{curriName}, #{periodFr}, #{periodTo}, #{startDay}, #{time}, #{num}, #{money}, #{support}, #{inquiry}, #{state}, (SELECT package_no from Package WHERE package_no = #{package_no}) );
mapper.select: select u.user_no, u.nameHan, u.birthDate, a.testResult, c.curriname from Users as u, ApplyInfo as a, Curriculum as c where u.User_no = a.User_no and c.curriculum_no = 1
